metadata.title: Mary Had A Little Lamb lyrics

songInfo.album:
from Texas Flood (Epic EK-38734) &
Live Alive (Epic EGK-40511) ,

lyrics.l: it's fleece was white as snow, yeah
the little lamb was sure to go, yeah
He followed her to school one day,
What a time did they have,
Sent a letter to my baby
On my way I past it
